modes.name: View in a lightbox
modes.description: When triggered, this MiniReel will open a lightbox on top of the web page.

modes.name: Lightbox Player
modes.description: Video player with editorial in the sidebar. No character limits, the content space will scroll as needed.

modes.name: Lightbox, with Playlist
modes.description: Video player with editorial under the video. A playlist will be displayed in the sidebar. No character limits, the content space will scroll as needed.

modes.name: View within the web page
modes.description: When triggered, this MiniReel will display itself in the allotted content space of your website.

modes.name: Embedded
modes.description: Recommended for content that is light on text. We suggest limiting copy to 200-300 characters, but the content area will scroll to allow for longer text.

modes.name: Embedded, Heavy Text
modes.description: Provides more room for editorial content. Copy is limited to approximately 420 characters.
